Middle Ages. Drawing on the forces of evil, on the couple throws a terrible spell: she will become hawk during the day and he in a gray wolf prowling at night. Eternally united and separated, find an ally in the young footman Philippe (Broderick), who will try to help them stave off the curse of the bishop.
